mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTRIBUTES (TYPE_ID, ENTITY_ID, GROUP_ID, ) VALUES (#{typeId}, #{entityId}, #{groupId}, #{values})
mapper.select: select A.*, AT.NAME, AT.VALUE_SYNTAX_ID, G.NAME AS GROUP_PATH from ATTRIBUTES A, ATTRIBUTE_TYPES AT, GROUPS G WHERE A.TYPE_ID = AT.ID AND G.ID = A.GROUP_ID
select A.*, AT.NAME, AT.VALUE_SYNTAX_ID, G.NAME AS GROUP_PATH from ATTRIBUTES A, ATTRIBUTE_TYPES AT, GROUPS G WHERE A.ID = #{id} AND A.TYPE_ID = AT.ID AND G.ID = A.GROUP_ID
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ATTRIBUTES WHERE ENTITY_ID = #{entityId} AND GROUP_ID = #{groupId}
